generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalks, which is the main surface for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A paved area with a curb on the right side of the road, adjacent to the building, is clearly designated for pedestrians.
- building: A multi-story brick building is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Several trees and bushes are visible along the road and near the building.
- sky: The upper part of the image shows a bright, overcast sky.
- person: A person is visible standing near the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A black car is visible on the left side of the road, and other cars are visible further down the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the road, showing a red light.
- traffic sign: A yellow traffic sign with directional arrows is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
